        The concrete implementation of the OrderBOMService interface. Contains all business logic for managing Order BOMs and generating Purchase Orders.

    • Method Detail

      • saveAndGeneratePOs

        @Transactional
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> saveAndGeneratePOs​(OrderBOMDto bomDtoFromForm)
        Saves an Order BOM and then generates new Purchase Orders based on its details. It ensures that POs are not created for items that are already part of an existing PO.
        Specified by:
        saveAndGeneratePOs in interface OrderBOMService

      • save

        @Transactional
public OrderBOMDto save​(OrderBOMDto dto)
        Saves an Order BOM with an intelligent synchronization strategy for its details. It updates existing lines, adds new ones, and safely removes deleted lines (only if they haven't been used in a Purchase Order).
        Specified by:
        save in interface OrderBOMService
